name: Arcade Text Binary File
summary: A TXBN file is a game data file used by various video games, including Mario Kart Arcade GP DX, Luigi's Mansion Arcade, and Initial D Arcade Stage Zero. It contains information about a portion of a game's in-game text and how it should appear. Users are most likely to encounter TXBN files packaged within dumps of games that use the TXBN format.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
